description: This advanced course offers students an in-depth and interdisciplinary understanding of processes of urbanization in Southeast Asia. The course combines seminar discussion with workshops in which students learn how to analyse and develop their own urban planning and policy interventions that address key urban issues, ranging from community and economic development to climate resilience. Key questions include What are the emergent patterns of urban development in Southeast Asia? What strategies are adopted by local and regional government institutions, urban designers, and other organizations to guide urban development in the region? What might the future hold for urbanization in Southeast Asia?
title: Southeast Asia Urban Planning and Design Workshop
